sense.gloss: compulsory exercise (in gymnastics), compulsory routine, compulsory dance (figure skating), (a) compulsory

sdata.j: ↑医者↑↓いしゃ↓は↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓に↑厳↑↓きび↓しい|↑規定|↑↓きてい↓↑食↑↓しょく↓を↑勧↑↓すす↓めた。
sdata.e: The doctor ordered her to go on a strict diet.

sdata.j: その↑条項↑↓じょうこう↓は、↑議決↑↓ぎけつ↓はすべて↑過半数↑↓かはんすう↓をもって↑成立↑↓せいりつ↓すると|↑規定|↑↓きてい↓している。
sdata.e: The clause provides that all decisions shall be made by majority vote.

sdata.e: There are some cases where the rule does not hold good.

sdata.e: It is provided that the applicants must be woman.

sdata.e: Under the Constitution, the lower chamber's resolutions override those of the upper chamber.

sdata.j: ↑日本↑↓にっぽん↓の↑首都↑↓しゅと↓に↑関↑↓かん↓する|↑規定|↑↓きてい↓はなく、↑厳密↑↓げんみつ↓に↑言↑↓い↓えば、↑東京↑↓とうきょう↓は↑事実↑↓じじつ↓↑上↑↓じょう↓の↑首都↑↓しゅと↓にすぎない。
sdata.e: In absence of any stipulation regarding the capital city of Japan, strictly speaking, Tokyo is nothing more than a de facto capital.
